root.title: DNS Query for Ufile.io Upload Domain - DNS Client
root.description: Detects DNS queries to "ufile.io". Which is often abused by malware for upload and exfiltration
root.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

logsource.definition: Requirements: Microsoft-Windows-DNS Client Events/Operational Event Log must be enabled/collected in order to receive the events.

falsepositives.item: Legitimate DNS queries and usage of Ufile
